subject: Concussions
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby, the N.H.L.’s marquee player, says he still has not recovered from the concussion that sidelined him last January, but that he expects to return to hockey.
snippet: Sidney Crosby, the N.H.L.’s marquee player, says he still has not recovered from the concussion that sidelined him last January, but that he expects to return to hockey.
